Classics never die, CS SOURCE was one of the biggest advances for the gaming industries, creating better weapons and combat realistics compared with the old, look-like-shit textures of CS 1.6.   CS Source take everything that was done bad due to hardware limitations of the moment of CS 1.6 and make it a lot better. Love this version, love this game.
[b][i]for me this game is way better than cs:go

What is there to say? Probably the greatest pickup-and-play casual shooter there is. Still a great community active out there. Cheating isn't really so common or bad. But there are some amazing players out there that may make you think otherwise! Hah. Great game. Have fun with it.

a genuine and surreal experience for any avid fan of hit heist film ocean's twelve

Was Left 4 Dead's cooperative concept or Doom Zombie Ripping not enough to satisfy your needs for a first person shooter? Well here's Counter-Strike: Source, a successor to Counter-Strike: Global Offensive. Now with less cheaters, less gambling, and more mods, CSS is only $10 without being on sale, get it while you can and I hope you have fun on 24/7 dust2 servers, bhop servers, jailbreak, and more fun shenanigans.
